title: I need help on perma deleting my account.
body:
Hi Riot and everyone.

I have a huge favour to ask. I want to permanently delete my account because I find that I am becoming too toxic not just in game but in real life as well. Recently I got my chat suspended for 10 games.
I do not want League to take over my life before it's too late, so I am asking to permanently delete this account. I have bought over $35 AUD of RP but League is taking too much of my time and I don't find anymore enjoyment from it. I have bigger goals to achieve in real life. I don't care about the RP.

However the links provided here do not work: https://support.riotgames.com/anonymous_requests/new
                                          https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202647784-Account-Deletion-FAQ

Kind regards,

69420kony2012.

replies.body: The links seem to work fine for me. You may have to log out of the site then back in on the support site if that's the issue you're having. If not, what issue are you seeing that the links don't work for you?
